trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that displays a document on a screen as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um controlador de impressão que exibe um documento em uma tela como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Typically, to use the print preview feature, you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> class and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, para usar o recurso de visualização de impressão, você cria uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> de classe e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, though you can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> when managing the display of your own print preview window.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> é usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, embora você possa usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> ao gerenciar a exibição da janela de visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, performs the print preview, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> back to the original value.
trans-unit.target: Quando usado com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> define o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> de associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, realiza a visualização de impressão e define o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> para o valor original.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController" />.

trans-unit.source: Captures the pages of a document as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Captura as páginas de um documento como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo" /> that contains the pages of a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo" /> que contém as páginas de um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> image representation contained in a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> to implement your own print preview form.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> imagem representação contida em um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> para implementar seu próprio formulário de visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir segura em uma caixa de diálogo restrita.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this controller is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esse controlador é usado para visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém dados sobre como visualizar uma página no documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controles que determina quando e como visualizar uma página em um documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, this method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se uma exceção é gerada dentro de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, este método não é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir segura em uma caixa de diálogo restrita.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to preview the print document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contém dados sobre como visualizar o documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controles que determina quando e como visualizar um documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado imediatamente após <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the print preview process, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo se uma exceção não tratada foi lançada durante o processo de visualização de impressão, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir segura em uma caixa de diálogo restrita.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> que contém dados sobre como visualizar uma página no documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> property of this parameter will be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics" /> deste parâmetro será <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from this method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado desse método será usado para definir este propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a sequência de controles que determina quando e como visualizar uma página em um documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> que representa uma página de um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, makes the print preview look better.
trans-unit.target: Suavização, também conhecido como cinza dimensionamento, melhoram a visualização de impressão a aparência.

trans-unit.source: However, the use of anti-aliasing can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o uso de suavização pode reduzir a velocidade de processamento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about anti-aliasing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a suavização, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir segura em uma caixa de diálogo restrita.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> que representa o documento que está sendo visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> que contém dados sobre como imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a sequência de controles que determina quando e como visualizar um documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado imediatamente após <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> a um gráfico de uma única página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> método desaloca o objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> verifica se as configurações da impressora são válidas.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe.

trans-unit.source: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir segura em uma caixa de diálogo restrita.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.SafePrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use anti-aliasing when displaying the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a suavização deve ser usada ao exibir a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the print preview uses anti-aliasing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a visualização de impressão usa a suavização; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, uses several shades of gray around areas of curves and diagonals in text to give the text a smoother appearance.
trans-unit.target: Suavização, também conhecido como cinza dimensionamento, usa vários tons de cinza ao redor de áreas de curvas e diagonais em texto para que o texto de uma aparência mais suave.

trans-unit.source: While using anti-aliasing makes the print preview look better, it can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar a suavização torna a visualização de impressão parecem melhor, isso pode reduzir a velocidade de processamento.
